s1.message: The following lists the major changes compared to Adblock Plus 1.3.3.

s2.message: If you experience issues with this release please check the list of known issues.

s4.message: Firefox Mobile 4 is now supported, support for Firefox Mobile 1.0 has been dropped.

s5.message: K-Meleon 1.6 is now mostly supported (special builds required).

s6.message: Added support for Do-Not-Track header proposal (DNT), a filter like

s7.message:
will cause the header to be sent to all
    locations
    (

s10.message:
Added an experimental "Recommend us on Facebook" button to the menu allowing easily
    recommending Adblock Plus — only displayed to Facebook users.

s12.message: Malay and Estonian translations are included again.

s13.message:
Allowed shortcut key preferences to have multiple values, the first available shortcut key
    is used.

s14.message:
Changed default Preferences key to Ctrl-Shift-E (used in Firefox 3.x),
    Ctrl-Shift-F (used in Firefox 4) or Ctrl-Shift-O (Firefox 4 on Mac OS X).

s15.message: Special icon state for "whitelisted" websites has been removed, the icon is now showing as "disabled" on such sites as well (forum topic).

s16.message: "Enable Adblock Plus" menu item has been renamed into "Disable everywhere".

s17.message: Firefox Mobile: First-run page is now more suitable for a small screen.

s18.message: Fixed: Contents of first-run page are sometimes cut off (forum topic).

s19.message:
Fixed: "Edit filter in effect" in blockable items doesn't work correctly if Preferences
    dialog is already open.

s21.message: Disallowed reports with too many filter subscriptions.

s22.message:
Disallowed reports for certain types of pages (in particular blank tabs, e-mails, local
    pages, extension pages).

s23.message:
Thunderbird: Better reporting for blog posts, blog post address is now being sent instead
    of a meaningless mailbox address.

s24.message: Fixed: Disabled filter subscriptions should not be included in the report (forum topic).

s26.message: Implemented a faster filter matching algorithm (forum topic).

s27.message: patterns.ini file will only be saved on shutdown if some data actually changed.

s28.message:
Matching and element hiding data are now cached in the Adblock Plus data directory to reduce
    startup time.

s29.message:
Changed the way patterns.ini file is written to prevent data loss even if computer is
    switched off abruptly.

s30.message:
Corrupted patterns.ini files are now recognized, a backup file is loaded automatically if
    available.

s31.message:
Fixed: Element hiding rules might occasionally cause crashes
    (regression in Adblock Plus 1.3.3).

s32.message:
Fixed: Disabling filters from the list of blockable items doesn't actually disable the
    filter in Firefox 3.6.
